title: Test grid for newsletters?
body:
![IMG ALT](/images/uploads/svelte-radiant.png) [Article Name](https://www.google.com) Drew McLellan writes about the state of the HTML5 input types in 2019, which can be used, and which should still be avoided. [Read it](https://www.google.com) ➡️
